post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
JUnit scaffolding has been set up.

Create/Search/Delete tests are done against 9 data models among which the User test is the only one that runs without a failure.

To run the User test:

* Execute install.bat from the command line. This will set up a MySQL database.
* Right-click on UserTest.java and select Run As->JUnit Test. This will run 3 test cases and all of them will be shown as pass.

To run the entire tests:

* Right-click on AllTest.java instead. This will show 24 failures out of 27 runs.

* Execute uninstall.bat to clean up the database.

Note that the model API and the database design is not final yet but you should be able to see the picture of what I am doing.

Enjoy.
post.title: JUnit pass 11%
